document.full_text: former lt. gen. ricardo sanchez, who oversaw coalition forces in iraq before retiring after the abu ghraib prison abuse scandal, is running for the senate as a democrat.
document.title: southwest: texas: former general in iraq to run for senate
lines_and_colors: former lt. gen. ricardo sanchez, who oversaw coalition forces in iraq before retiring after the abu ghraib prison abuse scandal, is running for the senate as a democrat.
